article_title: UnitedHealth's Cancer Pay Model Froze Doctor Drug Profits And Outcomes Improved

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: By paying oncologists a single fee and rewarding patient outcomes, UnitedHealth Group says it reduced costs of treating cancer patients by more than one-third in a test of value-based care in a specialized treatment setting. Medical oncologists generally make money by buying cancer drugs at a wholesale price from drug makers. [...]
